name: Eureka Domains
overview:
Eureka Domains manages and develops bulk domain assets.

With a large portfolio of their own, Eureka Domains found 20% of their domain portfolio provided 100% of the revenue, which meant 80% of the portfolio was under-utilized; a problem encountered by many domainers.

Eureka Domains offers domain asset development; focusing on converting under-performing domains into profit makers. By using powerful cutting-edge technology they add multiple monetizations, extraordinary indexing and drive natural traffic to dormant domains.

Their bulk domain management tool facilitates their “asset portfoilo” approach; as they can easily identify and manage high performers, under-utilized and dead domains.

Using this approach combined with an experienced team of “Domain Development Specialists” they successfully manage and grow profitable asset portfolios with an approach that is unique to other market offers.

milestones.description: Eureka Domains partnered with Winged Ventures Pty Ltd.
